title: break up? or no break up?
description:
Emma is analyzing all types of fan relationship situations, and giving her thoughts on how to approach it. Friendships, romantic relationships, even relationships with peers. Weighing the pros and cons of significant others, handling long distance, what to do if friends feel manipulative, even how to approach a situation where someone gets pregnant.
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
